name: NavigationLayoutMode

values.name: Auto
values.description:
Automatically calculates the navigation layout mode based on the screen device type.
`Expanded` on desktop and `Collapsed` on tablet and phone.
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * Automatically calculates the navigation layout mode based on the screen device type.
`Expanded` on desktop and `Collapsed` on tablet and phone.
 * @public
 */

_jsDoc:
/**
 * Specifies the navigation layout mode.
 * @enum {string}
 * @public
 * @alias @ui5.webcomponents-fiori.NavigationLayoutMode
 * @ui5-module-override @ui5/webcomponents-fiori NavigationLayoutMode
 */
